about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: We are a team of <bold>young technology enthusiasts</bold>, graduates of the <bold>Faculty of Automatic Control and Computer Science</bold> at Politehnica University of Bucharest, dedicated to transforming ideas into high-performance digital solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: We formed as a team at <bold>Politehnica University of Bucharest</bold>, Faculty of Automatic Control and Computer Science, where our <bold>passion for technology</bold> united us and motivated us to create together.
story.paragraph2: We have diverse experience - we've worked in <bold>large corporations</bold>, <bold>dynamic startups</bold>, and as <bold>independent freelancers</bold>. This variety of experiences has given us a unique perspective on the needs of different types of businesses.

philosophy.title: Our Vision
philosophy.paragraph1: We believe that <bold>modern technology</bold> can transform any business. We focus on <bold>process automation</bold> and creating digital experiences that deliver concrete and measurable results.
philosophy.paragraph2: We have the <bold>patience to understand</bold> the needs and business cases of your company. We know that the decision to automate processes is difficult - there's an <bold>inertia in the face of innovation</bold> and changing traditional processes can seem intimidating.
